title: 里賞精選 | 五月
ogDescription: 每月為你搜羅至熱旅遊優惠 —— 五月推介已準備就緒，立即展開里賞之旅！

lod.intro: 本月自選里程：專享一系列全新餐饗及購物禮遇，由日常體驗以至難忘經歷，賺取更多里數，感受更多寵愛。里賞精選 ——理想生活之源。
lod.beforeQr:
「亞洲萬里通」里賞精選
每月為你搜羅至熱旅遊優惠 —— 五月推介已準備就緒，立即展開里賞之旅！
lod.afterQr: 截圖QR碼，開啟微信掃瞄，然後分享。

data.headline: 蒞臨Cafe Deco Group   品味一個完美晚上
data.leadIn: 無論與同事放工後暢飲一番，或與親友聯誼歡聚，Cafe Deco Group旗下餐廳早已為你準備好雅致優閒的環境，讓你享受美好時光...
data.offerBody:
優惠詳情

想與好友歡度一個優閒晚上，不妨到Cafe Deco Group旗下餐廳享用滋味之至的德國美食，又或一嚐各式歐美佳餚。現消費滿800港元以上，即享額外500里數；此外，你更可獲贈100港元現金券，留待下次再來大飽口福！

賺取方法
賺取里數三部曲
  1. 結賬時，向餐廳職員示意賺取「亞洲萬里通」餐飲里數。
  2. 以下列任何形式出示你的「亞州萬里通」會員卡及號碼：
    • 會員卡 或
    • 電子會員卡 或
    • 聯營信用卡
  3. 職員將會給你一張100港元現金券供下次使用，以及「亞洲萬里通」美味無限賞單據以茲證明。
Participating Restaurants
  • Beerliner German Bar & Restaurant
  • Cafe Deco Pizzeria
  • 峰景餐廳
  • Cafe Deco - Hong Kong Internatioal Airport
  • 山頂餐廳酒吧
  • Pickled Pelican
  • Pivo Czech Bar
  • Stormies
  • The Beerhouse
  • The Boathouse
  • Watermark
data.tandcBody:
1. Cafe Deco Group優惠（以下簡稱「推廣優惠」）的推廣期由香港時間（GMT +8）2017年5月26日至7月31日，首尾兩天包括在內（以下簡稱「推廣期」）。
  2. 推廣期內，惠顧指定Cafe Deco Group旗下餐廳（名單請參閱推廣專頁）認可消費淨值滿800港元或以上，即可獲贈額外500里數，以及100港元Cafe Deco Group現金券（以下簡稱「現金券」）供下次使用。現金券可於下次惠顧指定Cafe Deco Group旗下餐廳時使用（名單請參閱推廣專頁），惟現金券的金額不能用作賺取里數。現金券只能使用一次及不可與其他優惠同時使用，及不可兌換現金及貨品。
  3. 現金券有效日期至2017年8月31日。
  4. 每位會員最多可賺取4,000「亞洲萬里通」額外里數。
  5. 會員須於要求結賬及付款時出示印有會員號碼的會員卡、聯營信用卡或電子會員卡，方可賺取「亞洲萬里通」餐飲里數。
  6. 除特別註明，會員所賺取之「亞洲萬里通」里數將根據總消費金額計算，包括服務費及稅項，但不包括小費及現金券。為免引起爭議，合資格之交易由扣除小費及現金券後（如適用）的總金額為準。
  7. 惠顧推廣美食及特定套餐，不可賺取里數。請預先向Cafe Deco Group查詢。
  8. 獎賞里數不可退款、轉換或轉讓。額外里數將於此推廣優惠結束後 8 至10星期內存入會員賬戶。
  9. 此優惠不可與其他推廣優惠或折扣一併使用（包括「Foodies11」優惠）。
  10. 亞洲萬里通有限公司保留權利隨時更改有關條款及細則或中止此推廣優惠，而毋須預先通知。
  11. 如本條款及細則之中與英文版有任何歧義，概以英文版本為準。
  12. 如有任何爭議，亞洲萬里通有限公司及Cafe Deco Group保留最終決定權。
  13. 所有圖片只供參考。
  14. 須受其他「亞洲萬里通」條款及細則約束。

data.headline: A Delectable and Rewarding Experience at Sino Hotels
data.leadIn: Enjoy a memorable dining experience at one of Sino Hotels and earn 1 for every dollar you spend with a minimum spending of HKD800...
data.offerBody:
Offer

Enjoy HKD1 = 1 upon eligible spending of HKD800 or more at Sino Hotels.

Satay Inn - A Taste of Singapore
Satay Inn offers an authentic taste of Singapore. With contemporary décor as inviting as the menu of genuine crowd-pleasers such as Hainan Chicken Rice and Assorted Satays available at The Royal Pacific Hotel & Towers, City Garden Hotel and Hong Kong Gold Coast Hotel.

Café on the PARK - The Best in All Day Dining
Enjoy a sumptuous buffet while overlooking bustling Tsim Sha Tsui at Café on the PARK. With its interactive cooking stations, pan-Asian and Western cuisines and full-length windows welcoming natural light, Café on the PARK lets you indulge in the bountiful buffet or choose from the a la carte menu.

Participating Restaurants

City Garden Hotel

  • Satay Inn

The Royal Pacific Hotel & Towers

  • Café on the PARK
  • Pierside Bar & Restaurant
  • Satay Inn

Hong Kong Gold Coast Hotel

  • Satay Inn

Island Pacific Hotel

  • Centre Street Kitchen

The Pottinger Hong Kong

  • Gradini Ristorante E Bar Italiano

Check out the above participating restaurants and reserve NOW!

How to Earn
3 Steps to earn Miles
  1. Inform Staff that you want to earn Asia Miles from Dining when paying the bill.
  2. Present your Asia Miles Membership Card with your Membership number in any form:
    • Physical Membership Card or
    • Mobile Membership Card or
    • Co-brand Credit Card
  3. Staff will pass you an “Asia Miles Dining Receipt” for record.
data.tandcBody:
1. Sino Hotels promotion (“Promotion”) lasts from 26 May to 31 August 2017 (HKT), both dates inclusive (“Promotion Period”).
  2. This Promotion is applicable to eligible dine-in transaction of HKD800 or above at selected SINO Hotels restaurants.
  3. Members will earn 1 Asia Mile per HKD1 spend upon eligible spending of HKD800 or more at any participating partner restaurant (full list as stated on the promotion page).
  4. Members are required to present their membership number by showing physical membership card, co-brand credit card or mobile app membership card when requesting the bill and at the time of payment in order to earn Asia Miles on dining transactions.
  5. Unless otherwise specified, earned Asia Miles are based on the total amount spent, including service charges and taxes, but excluding tips.
  6. Asia Miles cannot be earned on certain promotional menus and set menus. Please check with SINO Hotels restaurants prior to dining.
  7. Asia Miles awarded through this Promotion are non-refundable, non-reversible and non-transferable. Bonus Asia Miles will be credited to the member's account within 8 - 10 weeks after promotion end.
  8. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotional offer or discount, including Foodies 11 promotion.
  9. Asia Miles Limited reserves the right to change the terms and conditions or terminate this promotion at any time without prior notice.
  10. In case of discrepancy between the English and Chinese versions of these terms and conditions, the English version will prevail.
  11. In case of any dispute, the decision of Asia Miles Limited and SINO Hotelsshall be final.
  12. All photos are for reference only.
  13. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.

data.headline: Make Tack Hsin your Go-To Hotpot Hotspot
data.leadIn: There’s no better way to enjoy a meal with friends than having a steaming hotpot full of goodies at the centre of your conversations...
data.period:
Promotion Period:
25 May to 31 July
data.offerBody:
Offer

During the promotion period, members can enjoy the following benefits when dine in selected restaurants* under Tack Hsin Restaurant Group.

  1. Enjoy HKD1 = 1 for their second and afterwards eligible dine-in transaction of HKD300 or above at any selected restaurants during the promotion period.
  2. Choose your own complimentary drinks (either one below)
    • jar of sugar cane juice or
    • jar of orange juice or
    • a large bottle of selected beer per table

    when you order a la carte dinner or hot pot with spending of HKD300 or above at Jade Terrace and Tack Hsin Restaurants.

Tack Hsin Restaurant is well known for serving one of the greatest Hotpot Pot cuisine in town with the finest and freshest of hot pot ingredients.

The French award-winning Jade Terrace Restaurant serves an extensive selection of dim sum specialties and exquisite Cantonese dishes.

Tokuoki Beef Shabu and Tokuya Yakiniku offer all-you-can-eat Japanese shabu-shabu hot pot or yakiniku (grilled meat dishes), with several grades of beef to choose from. You may also enjoy an unlimited supply of side dishes, beer, soft drinks and ice cream from the self-service buffet bar.

*Participating Restaurants
  1. Jade Terrace Restaurant
  2. Tack Hsin Restaurant Group
  3. Tokuoki Beef Shabu
  4. Tokuya Yakiniku
How to Earn
3 Steps to earn Miles and Offers
  1. Inform Staff that you want to earn Asia Miles from Dining and ask for the complimentary drink when place meal/ beverage order.
  2. Present your Asia Miles Membership Card with your Membership number in any form:
    • Physical Membership Card or
    • Mobile Membership Card or
    • Co-brand Credit Card
  3. Staff will pass you “Asia Miles Dining Receipt” for record.
data.tandcBody:
1. Tack Hsin Restaurant Group Promotion (“promotion”) lasts from 25 May to 31 July 2017 (GMT+8), both dates inclusive (“promotion period”).
  2. This Promotion is applicable to member’s second and afterwards eligible dine-in transaction of HKD300 or above at selected restaurants under Tack Hsin Restaurant Group:
    • Jade Terrace Restaurant (Tsim Sha Tsui)
    • Tack Hsin Restaurant (Jordon and Tsim Sha Tsui)
    • Tokuoki Beef Shabu (Causeway Bay and Mongkok)
    • Tokuya Yakiniku (Causeway Bay and Mongkok)
  3. Member can enjoy HKD1 = 1 for their second and afterwards eligible dine-in transaction of HKD300 or above at any selected restaurant during the promotion period.
  4. Each member can earn a maximum of 10,000 Bonus Asia Miles from this Promotion.
  5. Unless otherwise specified, Asia Miles earned are based on the total amount spent, including service charges but excluding tips.
  6. Asia Miles cannot be earned on certain promotional menus and set menus. Please check with the restaurants prior to dining.
  7. Members are required to present their membership number by showing physical membership card, co-brand credit card or mobile app membership card when requesting the bill and at the time of payment in order to earn Asia Miles on dining transactions.
  8. Asia Miles awarded through this promotion are non-refundable, non-reversible and non-transferable. Bonus Miles will be credited to the member's account within 10 weeks after the promotion ends.
  9. Member is entitled to a complimentary jar of sugar cane juice, jar of orange juice, or large bottle of selected beer per table (choice of 1) when they order a la carte dinner with spending of HKD300 or above at Jade Terrace Restaurant (Tsim Sha Tsui) or Tack Hsin Restaurant (Jordon and Tsim Sha Tsui).
  10. The Complimentary Offers cannot be exchange for cash, any other food or drink.
  11. Members are required to present their membership number by showing physical membership card, co-brand credit card or mobile app membership card as soon as they’re seated or when requesting the Complimentary Offers.
  12. This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with the Asia Miles Foodies11 offer and any other special offer/discounts.
  13. Asia Miles Limited reserves the right to change the terms and conditions or terminate this promotion at any time without prior notice.
  14. In case of discrepancy between the English and Chinese versions of these terms and conditions, the English version will prevail.
  15. In case of any dispute, the decision of Asia Miles Limited and Tack Hsin Restaurant Group shall be final.
  16. All photos are for reference only.
  17. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.

data.headline: Enjoy the Perks of Being an Asia Miles and The Club Member
data.leadIn: Choose auto-conversion Now and make the most of your Clubpoints. Convert them into Asia Miles at an incredible rate of 1 Clubpoint = 1 to gain access to a wide-ranging catalogue of lifestyle items on iRedeem and limited-time promotional offers...
data.offerBody:
Offer

Take advantage of the incredible rate of 1 Clubpoint = 1 and start converting today. Choose Auto-conversion where you can convert 100 Clubpoints to 100 Asia Miles or Flexi-conversion where you can convert 300 Clubpoints to 300 Asia Miles.

How to Earn
  1. You must be a member of The Club
  2. Simply complete the online Asia Miles conversion request form at The Club website.

data.headline: Enjoy the Latest Trends with CHARLES & KEITH
data.leadIn: Indulge in luxury and stay in the trend when you shop online with Charles and Keith...
data.period:
Promotion Period:
29 May to 11 June
data.offerBody:
Offer

CHARLES & KEITH transforms the latest trends into accessible fashion, its product offerings have diversified to include shoes, bags and accessories and costume jewellery that inspire with experimental designs.

The brand is the fashion destination for stylish urbanites and is synonymous with curated collections of relevant designs.

  • Regular rate: USD1 = 1.25
  • Bonus rate: USD1 = 2.5 for existing customers
  • New customers will earn double rewards at USD1 = 5
How to Earn
  1. Log in to iShop
  2. Browse at the dedicated iShop CHARLES & KEITH link by pressing "Shop Now"
  3. Complete the transaction via the dedicated link

data.headline: Earn HKD8 = 1 with New Partner Tic Tac Time
data.leadIn: Start earning miles with HK renowned timepiece retail chain offering a selection of over 80 brands of watches like Longines, Tissot, Maurice Lacroix, and Casio...
data.offerBody:
Offer

Established in 1997, Tic Tac Time now has 20 outlets in prime locations of Hong Kong. With the ease of accessibility, customers can enjoy its bespoke shopping experience with a regular earning rate of HKD8 = 1.

How to Earn

Present your membership number by showing physical membership card, co-brand credit card or mobile membership card when making your purchase at participating stores.

data.headline: Shop Online Now and Earn Asia Miles Anytime Anywhere
data.leadIn: Earning Asia Miles is easy when you shop with over 1,000 merchants offering fantastic products and brands...
data.offerBody:
Simple Steps to Earn with iShop
  1. Log iShop
  2. Select Online Stores
  3. Shop and Earn Miles

27,100

Offer

Riders can redeem the Tonino Lamborghini 20” folding bike on iRedeem for their next cycling adventure with friends and family.

The waterproof case can capture underwater activities up to 30m and comes with a remote control for convenient wrist use...

18,000

Offer

Redeem the ProSports 4K Action Camera to record the moments you live for on your next trip in hi-definition.

data.brandName: Matador Transit30 Weatherproof Pack Away Duffle
data.headline: Don’t Leave Home Without The Transit30 Duffle Bag
data.leadIn: An ultra-light 30-litre duffle bag that can be packed up nicely and fits in the palm of your hand, Transit30 is the ultimate travel companion for every adventure. Redeem this waterproof duffle bag for your next trip!

Now to 30 Sep
Miles:
10,600

Offer

Redeem the Matador Transit30 waterproof pack-away duffle bag to make your summer getaway a little easier to navigate and convenient enough to have with you without compromising free space.
